title: To Sing Frogs
description: Venture deep into the heart-warming-and heart-wrenching-world of international adoption as John Simmons' poignant memoir chronicles his family's personal quest to rescue five children from an impoverished rural Russian orphanage. To Sing Frogs recounts the Simmons family's journey to discover the true meaning of family, while nurturing Sarah, adopted at age five, through the inner turmoil of survivor's guilt, having left so many of her closest friends behind at the orphanage.
author: John M. Simmons
